FieldName="MenuPart" FieldValue="{}{{
	var t= '{"data" : [ [[serializedTreeViewJSON]] ]}';
	var jsonObj = eval('('+ t +')');
	var tmp = jsonObj.data[0]["children"];

	if(tmp.length > 0){
		var resultText = '<ul id="[[menuID]]" class="menu">';
		for(var i = 0; i < tmp.length; i++){
			resultText += '<li [[menuTypeStyle]]><a href="'+ tmp[i]["tooltip"] + '">' + tmp[i]["title"] + "</a>";
			var lvl2Children = tmp[i]["children"];
			if(lvl2Children != null){
				resultText += '<ul style="width:100%;">';
				for(var q = 0; q < lvl2Children.length; q++){
					resultText += '<li style="width:100%;"><a href="' + lvl2Children[q]["tooltip"] + '">' + lvl2Children[q]["title"] + '</a>';
					var lvl3Children = lvl2Children[q]["children"];
					
					if(lvl3Children != null){
						resultText += '<ul style="width:100%;">';
						for(var z = 0; z < lvl3Children.length; z++){
							resultText +='<li style="width:100%;"><a href="' + lvl3Children[z]["tooltip"] + '">' + lvl3Children[z]["title"] + '</a></li>';
						}
						resultText += "</ul>";
					}
					resultText += "</li>";
				}
				resultText+= "</ul>";
			}
			resultText+= "</li>";
		}
		resultText += "</ul>";
	}else{
		var resultText = "";
	}

	[[xpath('//InjectedCss/text()')]]

	$(document).ready(function(){
		/* write the JS required for the menu */
		var script = "";
		[[xpath('//InjectedScript/data/text()')]]

		$("#[[menuID]]").buttonset();
		
		$("#[[menuID]]").ptMenu([[direction]]);
	});
